## Description {#details}

This contains common combine transformations that may be used in a combine pass,or by the target elsewhere.

Targets can pick individual opcode transformations from the helper or use tryCombine which invokes all transformations. All of the transformations return true if the MachineInstruction changed and false otherwise.

<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If \\p MI is G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS, try to combine it.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true if MI changed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Right now, we support:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - concat&#95;vector(undef, undef) =&gt; undef</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - concat&#95;vector(build&#95;vector(A, B), build&#95;vector(C, D)) =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   build&#95;vector(A, B, C, D)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ==========================================================</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check if the G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS \\p MI is undef or if it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// can be flattened into a build&#95;vector.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In the first case \\p Ops will be empty</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In the second case \\p Ops will contain the operands</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// needed to produce the flattened build&#95;vector.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\pre MI.getOpcode() == G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combinerhelper/#a84bf6a20255406e9c9f6a52f5c4c7b34">matchCombineConcatVectors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Register&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/combinerhelper/#a7474d0e2d570539a3e93b86c67b1bae9">matchCombineShuffleConcat</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Optimize memcpy intrinsics et al, e.g. constant len calls.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// /p MaxLen if non-zero specifies the max length of a mem libcall to inline.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For example (pre-indexed):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $addr = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD $base, $offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $val = G&#95;LOAD $addr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $whatever = COPY $addr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// --&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $val, $addr = G&#95;INDEXED&#95;LOAD $base, $offset, 1 (IsPre)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $whatever = COPY $addr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// or (post-indexed):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     G&#95;STORE $val, $base</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $addr = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD $base, $offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $whatever = COPY $addr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// --&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $addr = G&#95;INDEXED&#95;STORE $val, $base, $offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     $whatever = COPY $addr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Examines the G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD instruction \\p PtrAdd and determines if performing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a re-association of its operands would break an existing legal addressing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// mode that the address computation currently represents.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> reassociationCanBreakAddressingModePattern(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;PtrAdd) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Behavior when a floating point min/max is given one NaN and one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// non-NaN as input.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SelectPatternNaNBehaviour &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">    NOT&#95;APPLICABLE = 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/// NaN behavior not applicable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal">    RETURNS&#95;NAN,        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given one NaN input, returns the NaN.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal">    RETURNS&#95;OTHER,      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given one NaN input, returns the non-NaN.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="normal">    RETURNS&#95;ANY </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given one NaN input, can return either (or both operands are</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="comment">                /// known non-NaN.)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns which of \\p LHS and \\p RHS would be the result of a non-equality</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// floating point comparison where one of \\p LHS and \\p RHS may be NaN.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If both \\p LHS and \\p RHS may be NaN, returns</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// SelectPatternNaNBehaviour::NOT&#95;APPLICABLE.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">  SelectPatternNaNBehaviour</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><Highlight kind="normal">  computeRetValAgainstNaN(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal">                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsOrderedComparison) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Determines the floating point min/max opcode which should be used for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a G&#95;SELECT fed by a G&#95;FCMP with predicate \\p Pred.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns 0 if this G&#95;SELECT should not be combined to a floating point</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// min or max. If it should be combined, returns one of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#42; G&#95;FMAXNUM</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#42; G&#95;FMAXIMUM</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#42; G&#95;FMINNUM</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#42; G&#95;FMINIMUM</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Helper function for matchFPSelectToMinMax.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   SelectPatternNaNBehaviour VsNaNRetVal) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
